rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with traditional Kerala motifs and an open veranda.
Connected to the kitchen for easy access. Traditional design with woodwork accents.
Large open space with central hearth, following Vastu principles and Kerala architectural style.
Modern amenities integrated with traditional Kerala features, ventilation designed as per local norms.
Dual car garage with storage area, positioned for easy access to main entrance.
A small bathroom on the ground floor adjacent to living areas.

openings.location: Living Room - North wall, aligning with Vastu's recommended north window for positive energy.
